extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerabilities by verifying the installed version of VMware vCenter Server or VMware Cloud Foundation.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerabilities?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected VMware vCenter Server or VMware Cloud Foundation to the latest version as per the vendor's instructions.

cve_id: VMware vCenter Server and Cloud Foundation Vulnerabilities
